title: Ranking the capacitance of four capacitors

content.question: The four parallel plate capacitors have the plate dimensions, plate separation, and dielectric constants shown in the figures. Each capacitor is connected to its own battery of voltage <math alttext="V" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and allowed to fully charge. Which of the following ranks the capacitors from MOST to LEAST charge stored on its plates?

choices.label: <math alttext="1 is greater than 2, which is greater than 3, which is greater than 4" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>></mo><mn>2</mn><mo>></mo><mn>3</mn><mo>></mo><mn>4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 is greater than 3, which is greater than 4, which is greater than 1" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>></mo><mn>3</mn><mo>></mo><mn>4</mn><mo>></mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 is greater than 4, which is greater than 1, which is greater than 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>></mo><mn>4</mn><mo>></mo><mn>1</mn><mo>></mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="3 is greater than 1, which is greater than 4, which is greater than 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>></mo><mn>1</mn><mo>></mo><mn>4</mn><mo>></mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="3 is greater than 4, which is greater than 1, which is greater than 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>></mo><mn>4</mn><mo>></mo><mn>1</mn><mo>></mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="3 is greater than 1, which is greater than 4, which is greater than 2" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>></mo><mn>1</mn><mo>></mo><mn>4</mn><mo>></mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
